#summary p126 control file data format.
#sidebar TOC

== p126.dat ==

A typical p126.dat file has the following format:

{{{
program_name
mesh
nels nn nr fixed_equations nip
visc rho tol limit
cjtol cjits penalty
x0 ell kappa partitioner
}}}

||*Variable Name*||*Type*||*Meaning*||
||{{{program_name}}} || Character || Name of the program. Here the permitted value is {{{p126}}}||
||{{{mesh}}} || Integer || Element node ordering scheme. Permitted values are {{{1}}} (Smith and Griffiths scheme) or {{{2}}} (Abaqus scheme).||
||{{{nels}}} || Integer || Number of elements in the mesh.||
||{{{nr}}} || Integer || Number of restrained nodes in the mesh.||
||{{{fixed_equations}}} || Integer || Number of equations with an applied velocity.||
||{{{nip}}} || Integer || Number of integration points.||
||{{{visc}}} || Real || Fluid viscosity.||
||{{{rho}}} || Real || Fluid density.||
||{{{tol}}} || Real || Tolerance for outer loop.||
||{{{limit}}} || Integer || Iteration limit for outer loop.||
||{{{cjtol}}} || Real || Convergence tolerance for BiCGStab(l).||
||{{{cjits}}} || Real || Iteration limit for BiCGStab(l).||
||{{{penalty}}} || Real || Penalty.||
||{{{x0}}} || Real || Start value.||
||{{{ell}}} || Integer || l in the BiCGStab(l) process.||
||{{{kappa}}} || Real || kappa in the BiCGStab(l) process.||
||{{{partitioner}}} || Integer || Determines whether partitioning is internal or external.||

A real example follows:

{{{
'p126'
2
1000000 4090601 3120302 20401 8
0.1000E-01 0.1000E+01 0.1000E-02 30
0.1000E-04 5000 0.1000E+06
0.1000E+01    4 0.0000E+00  1
}}}
